# Soups
All soups are prepared using a pot. Its special feature is the ability to [color=yellow]combine both solid ingredients and liquids[/color].
To make soup, pour the necessary liquids into the pot, add the necessary ingredients, and place the pot on the stove. After a while, your soup will be ready! The main thing is [color=red]not to forget to remove it from the heat[/color], otherwise your soup will turn into a burnt mess.
